subject: VAM PRO
description_text:
Like everyone else, my motors worked good for a few days now they keep
shutting off, I have to unplug them reconnect and they will work for few
minutes and off again, I just installed the latest update. Pedals work fine
PRO X PEDALS. I’m only using the brake vam pro for abs , and it has worked
for all my sim , even iracing worked for a few hours now nothing. Let me
know if you want to hop into pc and have a look

conversations.body_text: Hi 4c farm and racing,   Please uninstall the SIMSONN Manager currently installed on your PC, then download and install the latest SIMSONN Manager v2.1.3 from our official website. After installation, please update the device firmware to: CPU1: 2.0.6, CPU2: 2.0.4. Once updated, replug the device and test again. Additionally, we recommend connecting the PC case/chassis and the controller box screw/metal housing with a wire to ensure a common ground. This often helps reduce interference and can resolve signal dropouts/disconnections.   If this occurs, it indicates that your PC’s grounding may be unreliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used in a grounded wall outlet. You can refer to the post below and connect the three metal screws on the PC case, control box, and pedals, which should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
